website_summaries.verdict: This callus remover is superior to other rasp-type removers and will take out a callus with little effort.
pros: Intended to be used on dry feet, so the user doesn't have to soak his or her feet for a while before using
It is durable and works on the toughest calluses
cons: The rasp does have sharp edges
users need to work on their calluses a little at a time because the blades can cut into live skin easily

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff Microplane
customer_reviews.text: Knockoff Microplane. As they make products of superlative quality, Microplane products are branded as such (as seen in the picture). They are made in the USA and assembled in Mexico. The product I received does not say “Microplane” anywhere and the packaging stated that it was “Made in China.” This was not the product shown in the picture nor what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Schoonmaker

customer_reviews.title: Never paying for a pedicure again!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, I was skeptical buying this because I've always had trouble removing dead skin no matter what product I use but I have to say that this thing really amazed me. It took all of the dead skin off my foot in about 5 minutes. It didn't rip or make my skin feel rough and my feet have that professional pedicure feel to them. I would recommend this to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Horwath

customer_reviews.title: Several uses
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet a lot, and this product takes all the dead calloused skin off my heels. It will require you to buff your feet afterwards, because it does leave the area a bit rough, I use a sanding foot pad, and when i'm done , my feet feel great. I purchased a second one, and labeled it for my kitchen. Its the best Microplane for grating cheese, nuts , and citrus rinds.. I know it sounds odd, but trust me its amazing..
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Golden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Item appears used, or possibly has been wet, as the metal is scratched and tarnished. The "grater" part is simply holes poked through metal, with many bent at odd angles. Did not remove skin as described. Also, definitely not made in USA as described. Sticker clearly says 'Made in China'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm using this wrong but it hurts the morn after
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions from reviews on how the best way to use this but i must've skipped over the correct instructions because the morning after i used this on my callous i could hardly walk. My foot felt like hot pokers were being pushed thru it. I'm just not too sure about this device. It's a catch 20 situation feeling for me. I either not use it and let the callousness worsen or knuckle down and use tbus device hoping it will help rid the calluses soon as possible. Just didn't think getting old and callous would sneak up so quickly:-)
customer_reviews.author: DerbyDudeDon

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and effective BUT
customer_reviews.text: After a while, it becomes dull. And then you have a big piece of plastic and metal that you don't necessarily want to add to landfill by just dumping in the trash. I wish there was a way to sharpen these things. I just bought my second, because my first one no longer worked after about a year, and wow, the difference between the new one and the old one is phenomenal. I had forgotten how sharp it is when it's brand new. If anyone know what to do with dull ones, besides just throwing them away, please let me know!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Colacito

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foot rasp. My second purchase because my first one eventually became dull and I was having to apply too much pressure. It is VERY effective at removing excess calloused skin. Use after shower/bath once your feet have been dried off after a couple minutes but the water has still plumped your normal skin. That way the soft skin does not scrape off easily but the callous will. DO NOT, I repeat, DO NOT! use on bone-dry feet: you will think all is well but will remove TOO MUCH skin. Then you will hobble about in pain with raw, exposed tissue for 4 days. Trust.
customer_reviews.author: Floridachelle

customer_reviews.title: Works Faster and Better than my Electric Callus Remover!
customer_reviews.text: This foot file is the best and fastest tool for removing calluses! I bought the electric callus remover two years ago that cost more than twice as much and took a lot longer to do the job. This simple rasp works very quickly and is simple to use. It has no parts that ever need replacing. I sit down and hold my foot over a wastebasket to file the callus away. Be sure to file lightly and check often to make sure you don't file too much the first time. Check after each pass back and forth or your feet could be tender and sore the next day. I was careful and didn't have any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Grind Your Feet Off--In a Good Way!
customer_reviews.text: Produces piles of parmesan-like gratings. This gets the callouses off in half the time with a quarter of the effort. 10 out of 10, would buy again. Even *if* this dulled tomorrow, after only a couple of uses, I'd still have thought it was worth it. If and when this one dies, I'll buy it again. Side note, other reviewers have mentioned that they didn't receive a true Microplane file. Indeed, the pictures from these reviewers show a file unlike the one I received. I got a file with the brand name "Microplane" etched into the metal, so it seems that mine, at least, is the genuine article.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This product really IS as great as everyone said!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to try this for cracking heels since everyone is getting them from walking around the house barefoot while we wait out the pandemic. You use the tool for chapped heels on DRY feet, then sanitize and dry it after use. It is fabulous! My son did his rough heels outdoors for the first time tonight, suspicious it was just a “Mom” idea, and came back in laughing at the simplicity of the thing. It worked. Mom’s know best! You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Eyre

customer_reviews.title: This works awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great tool for those of us that get callousy feet. I just have 2 recommendations for when you use. Do it when your feet are dry and don't over do it. It is so easy to just keep using it and then you realize you were too aggressive and your feet are tender for a few days. One other thing I noticed the first time I used it was that I had a hard callous edge around my heels and it worked and it worked so well I was walking wobbly for a few days because my body used those edges for balance. All-in-all this is a simple and effective tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow this thing  works great
customer_reviews.text: Since the quarantine and lack of pedicures I had some pretty nasty feet. My heels were pretty calloused and crusty... they were truly embarrassing. I was absolutely shocked how well this thing worked.... it took me approximately five minutes of light filing before I had pink pretty feet. My only comment would be to be careful. This file is so sharp that I was on the verge of over doing it. A little filing goes a long way.......
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Watch out!  This works!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not use on wet or moist skin. I rubbed too aggressively on dry feet right out of the gate. Sliced my skin right off. Ouch. I am a nerd who reads directions before using a new purchase of any kind. However, while most cautionary warnings on instructions are meant to chiefly fend off frivolous lawsuits stemming from idiotic users and/or greedy accident attorneys, these folks were not understating that CAUTION should be used when filing down the tootsies. SHARP means SHARP... Proceed with caution!
customer_reviews.author: resewsd

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With The Results
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today after purchasing months ago. Very pleased with the results. To note, I did apply lotion to my heel in the AFTER photo. The file is hard to maneuver around smaller spots; I had dead, dry skin on my ankle and it was almost impossible to file that spot without hitting skin I didn’t need to. There will be more dried skin than you think sloughing off, so I highly recommend using it in the bathroom or over a large towel.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does the job, that's for sure. I wish it were a little smaller, though. It works excellently on my heels, but getting to the balls of my feel I'm lucky I have good foot flexibility, otherwise I'd be shearing off my toes while I'm at it. It just kind of gets unwieldly if you're trying to attack smaller areas of your feet and it doesn't really angle well. Again, if you have flexible feet this isn't much of a problem, which is why I like it. But if your mobility's more limited you're going to want something smaller that can angle better.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C

customer_reviews.title: Cheese grater for your feet?
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels like a Parmesan cheese grater. Do NOT buy! Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: You need to use it to believe how well it works
customer_reviews.text: I walk around in flip flops almost all the time when I am at home (I live in AZ, where it is hot much of the year), so I get dry, cracked heels easily. I use pumice and other things to help slough off the dead skin, but nothing works like this thing. It's like a cheese grater for yucky feet skin. After the first use, I couldn't believe it took off as much dried goop AND as gently as it did. With a callous shaver, you risk cutting into your live skin, but not with this. Excellent and I would recommend it to anyone who does their own pedicures or wears sandals a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Pati

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully! Quick & Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Bob & Brad (physical therapists) recommended this product in one of their videos. I routinely get callouses on my big toe and it literally only took a FEW SECONDS to rasp off the rough edges. This thing is so quick & easy to use, you blink & you're done. That said, I would recommend that you use a VERY LIGHT pressure---you don't have to press down hard at all. I've not been amazed by a product's spot-on quality in a long time but this was definitely one of my smartest purchases. Taking care of my feet will be a lot easier from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great foot file
customer_reviews.text: With all the raving reviews how could I not try it out. Although the size of the product is in my opinion huge, and maybe there’s a reason for that I still won’t take any stars off because it does the job I needed it to do. As always make sure your feet are dry and lay something underneath your feet to catch the dead skin. Putting lotion on afterwards gives my feet a smooth feel. I’m warning you though, although I already knew this and have also read it in these reviews, I still accidentally over filed on the side of my foot by my pinky and was hurting for two days. So don’t over-file. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Amela Huidekoper

customer_reviews.title: Beware, stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in July and it worked amazing. But a few days later my feet became extremely raw and I had open cuts that are deep. It's now January and I have DEEP cracks in my heels that I've never had before. The cracks split open occasionally causing severe pain. My feet are raw and the cracked skin snags on socks and blankets. Save yourself the headache and stress. I now have to seek professional help for my feet. Everything I have done does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: It works! Best thing I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with super dry feet and horrible calluses for most of my life, I tried using those electric type things (like pedi egg or whatever it's called) and more but they didn't work. After looking at reviews for this item and seeing the before and after pics that people were posting with their reviews I decided to give this a try and I am really happy I did, it actually works! My feet feel amazing, it's been years since my feet have looked and felt this amazing. Really happy that I stumbled upon this item.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Communication from Company
customer_reviews.text: There was a mixup with the tracking info from the post office, but the company responded pretty quickly and offered a resolution in the end. The product did finally arrive after the post office fixed whatever happened on their end. I would definitely buy from this company again! The product itself works really well and feels very sturdy. Overall, it appears to be very good quality, and the package included instructions for using the Rasp and care instructions. So far, its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: not fake
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this because of several reviews saying it was counterfeit, but I took a chance and got mine today and it's authentic microplane. so for anyone skeptical...go ahead and order, maybe they fixed the supplier issue. I ordered mine on Jan 21 2019. can't wait to try it out! the pedicure I got recently used the same brand and it worked amazing
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Showers of blessings... And dead skin
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 Holy crap!!!! Its fantastic. Day 2 Used it again. Day 3 DON'T overdo it. Lol Took off a tiny bit too much skin. I think it's addictive. I just kept feeling though patches. Lol You will amputate your foot
customer_reviews.author: Dr.MDDC

customer_reviews.title: Best Ginger Grater I Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for feet, but my teenaged daughter was so upset because she had just bought a callous remover. So I quickly said, "It's for grating fresh tumeric and ginger." It works better than any ginger grater ever. It doesn't leave any fibers that could be mistaken for tiny hair. It is quick for zesting citrus. My new favorite kitchen tool. I'll be ordering another one for feet.
customer_reviews.author: Flutefingers

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 3 years - it works as well as the first time I used it. I use a little bit of body wash on the plane part, and it takes the calluses off with ease. Very satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I've bought a lot of products to keep my feet smooth, and after reading the good reviews for this item I had to give this a try. This works so much better than any stone or file that I've ever tried. The only thing is you have to take your time doing it and don't OVER DO IT. It will remove a lot of skin, those little blades are sharp. I would highly recommend this, it will take the dead skin off.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about it? BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was also looking for this. I had calleous’ on my feet that I hated for YEARS. I felt so disgusting and I hated my feet. I bought this after weeks of sitting on the decision and I am IN LOVE. This microplane removed the thickest of calleous’ in SECONDS. My feet have never looked better. I do recommend using with caution just because removing the dead skin will allow new skin and that may leave feet sore. It is 110% worth every single penny
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: No more hobbit feet!
customer_reviews.text: It's basically a lemon zester for your rock-hard nasty ol' feet and it works like a charm. If you have nail-proof callouses on your heels like I do, be prepared for the sheer amount of dead skin on the floor after you've played with this for a couple minutes. It's kind of frightening and you'll forever be scared of dust in the house. That being said, my girlfriend actually WANTS to give me foot massages these days now that I don't have Frodo Baggins feet. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy Platinum

customer_reviews.title: Super Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this foot file. It fits perfectly in my hand and its length makes it easy to reach all areas of my feet. The long grating blade seems to retain its sharpness very well after a couple of months of use. The only downside is that it is open, so if I'm not careful, the dead skin I've removed just falls to the floor, or the bed, or wherever I'm using it. I would have preferred a closed chamber to catch the particles, but I knew that when I bought it. Overall, quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Santa

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job and then some. You must be VERY careful. It can leave you in pain. This is actually a kitchen grater . . period. Looks exactly like a couple in my kitchen drawer. Again . . be careful.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoLady

customer_reviews.title: The best foot file on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have TOUGH dancer calluses and I regularly need to saw them down after a performance season. This is, hands down, the BEST foot file I've ever used. Gentle, but so thorough, makes you feel like you're getting a full pedicure with minimal effort! There's not much else to say, I love everything about this product, its size, effectiveness, durability, all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Barrial

customer_reviews.title: Amazing discovery!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and was amazed twice. First because it was made in USA and second because it works SO GOOD!!. I did not read the instructions and used it in the shower (NOT Recommended and not impressive). I read the instructions and it said use it with DRY foot. WOW! Big big difference. The old skin just came off super easy! Very impressed and highly recommend this microplane.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cedeno

customer_reviews.title: I went to town with this thing and the results are SO much better than I've ever gotten from a pedicure
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly a little in awe of just how well this little thing worked. I've had expensive pedicures before and I guess because they are worried about filing off too much of my calluses, they just give them a light buffing. I went to town with this thing and the results are SO much better than I've ever gotten from a pedicure. It's amazing and very easy to use. Even better than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: It works!  Truly works!
customer_reviews.text: This WORKS!!!! I have had callouses for decades - even after an expensive pedicure because some cannot be eliminated entirely (since razors have been banned by salons). This is SO much safer than “home razoring” and very fast. It actually takes more off than pedicurist can. Quick too so you can do it right before going out if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Kirkman

customer_reviews.title: ... to help “clean up” your feet this is an amazing product. Spent about ten minutes on each foot ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting something to help “clean up” your feet this is an amazing product. Spent about ten minutes on each foot with this thing & was amazed (along with slightly grossed out) as how much dead skin it took off. Little intimidating at first but once you get going it’s extremely easy. Did this with my feet completely dry prior to showering, once in the shower I applied a foot cream scrub then used a pumic stone & applied lotion when dried & done. Feet feel brand new & did not have to pay salon prices.
customer_reviews.author: David Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Removed a stubborn callus
customer_reviews.text: Helped me permanently remove a recurring callus on the side of my small toe. Originally I went to a doctor's office and a person shaved it down with a blade type callus but it came back. Not sure if the person was a doctor or a nurse practitioner. The person who shaved it down actually told me it would probably come back. I used a blade type shaver on it myself several times but it always came back. When I got this file I used the blade type shaver again on the callus and then finished with this file and the callus hasn't come back since. Also works great removing cracked skin around the heels.
customer_reviews.author: HMM

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Works!
customer_reviews.text: I live in AZ and wear sandles year round, my heals have become so calloused that I always have to pay extra for callous removal when I get a pedicure. Not anymore. I received my foot rasp today and used it immediately. My heals are smooth and soft but I actually should have stopped sooner as they are a little tender now. I will know better next time. I'm going to order another one for my daughter who lives here and has the same problem. I had tried to find this item at beauty supply stores as well as Walmart and other stores but could not find them. Amazon always comes through with availability and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: my friend told me about it and I was like..
customer_reviews.text: OMG... my friend told me about it and I was like.... all other stuff I bought throughout the years could only do so much. Always had to get my feet scrubbed hard by professionals to see any results. THIS ONE IS AMAZING. It does the job very well better than any pedicure I have ever got!! 10 minutes of "hard work" I used on my feet while watching my toddler actually made my feet feeling soft and fresh! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Min H

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Feet Are in Your Future!
customer_reviews.text: HOLY MOLEY... if you have calluses or rough skin this thing is WHAT YOU NEED. I had cracked heels, calluses from running, and rough skin. In a matter of just a few minutes I had a pile of dead skin (in my garbage can, thank you!) and baby-smooth feet. Just beware... once you start you just want to keep going, and if you're not careful you'll end up going too far and you'll have sore/raw feet. I recommend doing a gentle first pass, then give yourself a day and see how things look and feel. But if you want smooth feet this is the ONLY thing you need.
customer_reviews.author: hari sharma

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works like a fine cheese grater. Love it. Works so much better than the heel shaver. Will take down problem areas quickly whether you soak your feet first or not. Just slow it down when you get to the good skin else the next morning you will crawl to the toilet instead of walking. It is like the one they use at spas. Pros: Fast, easy, even, smooth removal Cons: Don't get carried away
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Will get smooth down the roughest skin on your feet but careful as it's sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foot filer and was recommended it by an athlete friend whose feet are on the ground at all times. You have to be careful when filing your feet as this tool is very sharp. On many occasions, I got carried away and smoothed down too many layers of skin causing it to bleed slightly. So be mindful of this when grooming yourself. Otherwise, this is the best tool I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia Ntn

customer_reviews.title: This saved my feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional sailboat captain and this saved my feet. Before I used this I would get cracked feet and my feet would hurt. I use it about twice a month now and its amazing. I recommend anyone who wears flip flops or goes barefoot a lot pickup one of these. Money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever, I was sceptical at first cause I thought the holes were to small to have any effect but I was wrong, took me abt 10 minutes to do my feet and I haven't had them done in years cause the nail shops never scrap the dead skin enough to satisfaction. But now my issues have been solved and I can do them myself with no effort at all, they are baby smooth again and I can't stop touching my feet now😜. GREAT PRODUCT, gonna buy more for sure. Best to do them dry as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: W LaFond

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: I wear sandals to work every day in the summer. It results in extremely dry and cracked heels. It’s so embarrassing! I’ve tried using heel cream (which helped a little) and gotten pedicures with no results. It took me all of 2 minutes to make my feet look brand new! I can not believe my eyes! This product really works and I recommend it to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken a before picture because I had “elephant like” skin calluses on my heels that built up for years. With 5 min of using this they were completely gone. I plan on using this once a week from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Z.

customer_reviews.title: Dang!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My feet get hecka dry and calloused because I walk around in flip flops year round. They’ll get bad enough to develop painful cracks. I try to use a foot file every morning & night and moisturize, but I get lazy sometimes. I just used this for the first tine and it took off 100% of my callouses in less than 5 minutes and completely blew my mind. My feet look the best they have since I used those baby feet foot peels. I’m amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Buhn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Calluses or Dry Heels
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, callused feet - especially my heels. I bought this to put in the shower so I could exfoliate while my feet were damp. I loved it so much that I just bought another one for my daughter. I had bought one from a discount store and it was not very good. The ratings for this on Amazon were so high, I decided to try it. What a difference!! This is so much better and the price was surprisingly affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Judy G. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: This works even on stubborn callouses and cracked heels
customer_reviews.text: This is micro plane is amazing. Worth it! I love going barefoot and since COVID-19 haven’t been able to get pedicures. My feet were looking terrible, especially my heels. This thing cleaned off layers of dead skin so quickly& painlessly. It is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: TXMomof2

customer_reviews.title: You know your feet is bad when you are happy an entire day for being ...
customer_reviews.text: Take this from me .I had the most nastiest crustiest feet imaginable.You could probably snatch a salmon going upstream with my nasty dried feet!So I got this mainly because I’ve been loooking for something that actually worked.I used this once the same day I got it not removed everything.You know your feet is bad when you are happy an entire day for being able to clean them.So I decided to buy two more one for my mom and my sister.Because if you could snatch salmons with my feet ,you could snatch a whale with theirs.Buy this n don’t spend money at the pedicure salons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like they use Professionally for Pedicures here
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a coworker of mine. She said it is perfect and exactly what her salon ladies use on her feet when she gets pedicures to get a quick smooth finish. My personal experience with metal grate feet files though cautions you to take it easy and slow if you haven't used this kind of foot file before. It takes skin off very quickly and you can sand off too much which will make your skin hurt after your bath/shower for a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: This tool is so great! I’ve always used the cheap dollar store foot ...
customer_reviews.text: This tool is so great! I’ve always used the cheap dollar store foot file and would get okay results. Purchased the microplane colossal pedicure and I’m super impressed. My first two strokes of using this product I knew I picked a winner. I was amazed and grossed out that so much dead skin was coming off effortlessly. My heels look awesome and will never go back to the cheap ones again!
customer_reviews.author: mziem

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I have tried so many of these types of "foot files" and had yet to find one that works. Until this one. I know it looks like a cheese grater, but it works FANTASTIC. I'll never use anything else. PS - I was horrified how much dead skin it removed, but in a really good way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I used it and it did take off a bit of the roughness on my heel, but my heel still feels very thick, dry, and not soft. It feels like I will hurt myself if I do it more. Just didn't get the results I saw in pictures on these reviews. I think my feet are just particularly troublesome, I also never got good results from the foot peel options.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dale

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this adequately before leaving a review... and I have! And I'm trying to figure out why it took so long for me to find this one! :) It works! I like there is no "soaking" time, as it works best on dry skin. It does not hurt, however my feet were a little sore after the first time I filed - but I did it right before bed, went to sleep and the next morning was as good as new :) I can now have manicured feet without the trip to have it done, and even better, without the costly expense. I like to follow it up with a moisturizing foot scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: hot knife through butter
customer_reviews.text: unit is beyond razor sharp. don't over do it or you will pay the price of raw "sausage" feet. use it gently. additionally, this unit is huge, about 10 inches by 2 inches...easy does it...i cannot imagine any type of unwanted skin this device cannot handle. my right foot had a callus on the ball, which hurt. skin was hard, thick, tough, & rubbery. microplane smoothed out the callus with ease. no more discomfort. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zoticus

customer_reviews.title: Where have YOU been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I've tried nearly every callous tool invented so I was pretty skeptical, but this thing is AMAZING!!! I've been looking for a "tool" to take the hard, dry, cracked callouses off my heels for most of my adult life. This has solved all my problems. I was shocked at how the dead stuff just flaked off and piled up on the floor. Oh, a word of advice...place a towel or newspaper under your feet the first time you use this, or better yet, go outside! I didn't...and I had a mess to sweep up when I was done.
customer_reviews.author: nisey

customer_reviews.title: Genuine item performs exactly as desired
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from La Belle B Supply and it appears to be a genuine Microplane product (all the labeling is in the right places). The file itself seems to work pretty well. It removes a lot of dead skin without being too abrasive -- no issues with the metal being jagged or anything like that. With the right pressure, I'm sure this could help anyone smooth their feet.
customer_reviews.author: James Hogue

customer_reviews.title: BEST. FILE. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow. I was skeptical about this product because it was cheap and I had owned a pedi-egg recently. There's literally no comparison. It is hands down the best thing ever. I have brand new feet again! It's like a miracle file. I have tried expensive kerasal for my heels, Korean foot peels, pumice stones... those all did nothing. I know this sounds like a promo spot but I guarantee you will not regret purchasing this if you have dry cracked heels.
customer_reviews.author: sarah sand

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: Growing up, I played a lot of sports and therefore had many calluses on my feet. As I got older, they stuck with me and no pumice stone or other foot scraper I've tried had done the trick.... until now. This file is amazing and to my surprise, it did not hurt whatsoever. My callus buildup literally came off within seconds and I can't remember the last time my feet were this smooth. Would definitely recommend! Just a tip, make sure you have a towel or the trash under your feet while doing this, because the amount of dead skin I shaved off was pretty disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Has a slightly aggressive shaving function. This can be a problem with Peripheral Neuropathy or any type of foot numbness. Just be very "light " on the touch to keep from breaking skin. Just go lightly and only a short period of time. I like it. I took off one star due to the aggressiveness.
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, use caution, it can be easy to remove too much callus. I had to put it down after watching the dry skin fly, and come back in a day or two. I use it outside, if you are indoors I would put down a towel to catch the flakes. I've always been a barefoot girl, now I have the smoothest feet I've had in decades!
customer_reviews.author: Jane T.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Product on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! I have used EVERY product available...for years. This product has done more in 10 minutes than ALL the Ped Eggs, Pretty Feet, rollers have..combined. The instructions say to use on dry skin, no presoak. I thought, "yeah, right. Not with my hard core tootsies!" The dead skin, calluses just came off with minimum effort! My feet haven't been this soft and supple in years. I guarantee anyone that uses this product will be amazed with the results...and for the price you cant beat it. I will NEVER use anything else again. P.S. 1st time you use it, do it over newspaper you'll be shocked at the amount of dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Thick, hard callouses are GONE!  Be careful to not over do it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! I wish I took before/after pictures to show how great this item is! My feet are so dry. I have extremely hard and thick callouses. The rasp easily removed the thick layer with very little effort. This works so well that you need to be careful to not over do it or else the skin will be too thin and will hurt. After using this, I applied O'Keeffe's foot cream to maintain my feet. Sorry Ped Egg....you've been replaced!
customer_reviews.author: AKT

customer_reviews.title: This works! Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well it worked. I sloughed off my grody calluses in less than a min. The handle is nice and grippy, very ergonomic. I’m tempted to order a couple more days n case this company goes out of business. It often seems that when I really liked me a beauty product, they quit making it. My only complaint, and this is nominal, is the hat the handle is an ugly 1978 Buick brown. Would be nice if they had cute designs. #DevelopedNationProblems.
customer_reviews.author: Skippythebat

customer_reviews.title: Damnnn my foot is good as new and here is a picture of what ...
customer_reviews.text: God sent, amazon delivered! I have borderline thyroid and have been struggling with an extremely dry cracked feet. After having read great reviews of this product and Dr Keefers foot cream, I ordered both together. The cream ream reached me two days back and this rasp reached today. I had applied Dr Keefers foot cream for two days and was raving then this guy comes and try shaving the dead skin out and it left me speechless!! Damnnn my foot is good as new and here is a picture of what came out with two minutes of using it. I’ve applied the foot cream back on with socks on and I’m sooo excited to flaunt my clean feet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pv

customer_reviews.title: Like drunk club s*x without the STIs
customer_reviews.text: Made an atheist shout "LAWD JESUS HELP ME" in the bathroom, causing her boyfriend to run in thinking she fell. I liken using this to a drunk bathroom club hookup. Disgusting but good gravy where have you been my whole life?!?! Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Student

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and can’t return it
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken and it says I can’t return or exchange it. The handle was broken off so it is not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day and wear tennis shoes all the time, my feet are pretty callused and started to get some deep cracks. Used this for a few minutes and got a pile of dead skin off of my feet, and they fee so Soft. This was super easy to use and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Bicking

customer_reviews.title: Most effective foot scraper ever!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was excited to buy this product. I love it. Definitely works well on dry skin and finally got rid of a bad callus on my toe. This is the best product I’ve ever used to make my feet smooth and soft. No more extra charges for a pedicure to scrape everything away.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri A.

customer_reviews.title: MY FEET ARE BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from extremely dry feet and this product has done so much for me. I never wore sandals or walked bare foot because of how dry my feet were. I'm so happy I bought this! Tip. use and as soon as you finish wash your feet and apply feet lotion and wear socks it works amazing
customer_reviews.author: lis

customer_reviews.title: I never knew that there is something effective as this one!
customer_reviews.text: I just have no words.. I bought about it 8 months ago and left it somewhere in my closet.. I used it today.. If I KNEW, I WOULD HAVE BEEN USING IT LONG TIME AGO.. IT IS THE BEST.. NO DOUBT.. MY FEET LOOK LIKE BABY FEET..WITHOUT NOTHING ELSE, JUST DRY USING IT, IT REMOVED ALL MY CALLUS AND DEAD CELLS OF MY FEET...After putting some lotion on my feet.. OMG...I usually do not write reviews but this... LOL
customer_reviews.author: Elaadj

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad i purchased this. When i got it i was so excited to use it right away. I read the directions which state to use it with DRY SKIN and I noticed that at the salons they don't! Well i used it and it worked better than expected! It didn't hurt at all. It was amazing seeing how much dead skin it took off. Amazing. Can't wait to brag about it and my new soft feet lol
customer_reviews.author: Yeremis

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for Dry Heels!
customer_reviews.text: I've always had issues with dry heels. My sister who has similar feet issues recommended this product to me, and I bought it skeptically. I've tried a lot of creams and pumice stones all with so-so results that didn't last. I have to say though, it works as great as she said!! You'll be amazed at how much dead skin comes off when you use this product. After you do a good filing of your feet the first time, I've found I only need to use this about once to twice a month in order to maintain. My heels also have never returned to being as bad as they were before I got my microplane.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great for my horrible heels
customer_reviews.text: I would give this planer a 5 if it weren't so flimsy where the head joins the handle. If you get too enthusiastic with your planing you'll snap it in half. I've already bent mine after about 4 uses. The planer stays sharp and I'm guessing it will outlast the handle. FYI, your feet need to be dry when you use this planer and you should be careful as it's easy to shave off too much skin and leave your foot sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Clucker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome produce to get your feet back in shape!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't waste time writing reviews about these small items but I had to for this. I had THICK layers of dead skin on my feet, on the heels and this thing just cleaned em all up. Works very well I highly recommend if you have those thick heels and cracking. Now I'm crack free and my feet feel so much better!!
customer_reviews.author: JEFF H

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rasp purchased from La Belle B Supply. I ordered from two other vendors, both of whom sent me counterfeit product. This company sells the real thing. I have very thick calluses on my heels and the rasp removes them quickly and painlessly. Does the job it is designed to do. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Techgal

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE WORKER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten a pedicure at a very expensive salon every 2 weeks for the last 2 years. Well, after using this foot file one time, my feet are so much better than the spa pedicure results. It removed my calluses and cracked heels after one use. I still can't believe how well it worked. I'M so happy to have found this product but am wondering what took me so long???!!!! I will definitely keep this file stocked at ALL times!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: truly revolutionary device
customer_reviews.text: I tried several versions of tools designed to remove thick dead foot skin. Those other ones could truly be called health products as they substituted for visits to your gym. You had to work your arm muscles really hard while developing an excellent aerobic program. And you can do it over and over again, at least every other day. Not this tool. You spend 15 seconds of light rubbing and ALL !! dead skin is gone. The only concern is to do it lightly enough that one doesn't lose an ankle. Cannot praise it enough. This tool is what astronauts on the space station would use. Or horses before the Kentucky derby.
customer_reviews.author: pavka

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life? ;)
customer_reviews.text: This is the grossest thing I have ever owned and I LOVE it. The foot files I had purchased previously did very little to remove the amazingly nasty calluses I get on my feet from wearing nothing but flip flops. The directions say to use this dry, but I refuse to clean up little nasty piles of dead skin so I use it in the shower. I think it does a great job in the shower. Other reviewers are correct on not going too crazy on your first couple of uses. I know you want to when you see what comes off, but don't.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wade

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing product I have used on my feet. I have dutifully used pumice stones, scrubs, and files and have never had results like this. The other products would smooth rough spots but didn’t remove the callouses or the thick dry skin on my heals. With very little effort, using this rasp it’s all gone! A word of caution though, go slow so you don’t take good skin off. I was a little too zealous with one of my toes and it was a little tender later. In any event, I highly recommend this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had dry skin on the bottom of my heels as well as a dry layer around my instep. The bottom of my heels did not get tender, but I had to be careful sawing on my instep. The skin is tender in that area and my feet were sensitive when I walked barefoot. No problem with my tennis shoes. I’m using Flexitol heel balm to moisturize the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. The previous reviews I have read were nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. The previous reviews I have read were nothing short of being accurate. Used it right when it came in, skin on my feet fell off, I wear a size 16 shoe and my feet were rough. Didn't go overboard as other reviews have read, used every other night thus far, applied lotion after and my feet haven't been this soft in years. My wife enjoys it, my sister used it last night for the first time and will be purchasing as well. only recommendation I have, put down a towel to catch all the skin that will come off.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: MAGICAL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this a few days ago and got it today. My heels have been a problem for several years. I am too embarrassed to wear backless shoes/high heels due to this problem. I've tried the MicroPedi, Ped Egg, plus more- with no difference. Just tried this- and let me tell you- it is PURE magic. Seriously. I've never been so satisfied with a product. My feet went from disgusting to baby soft. Why didn't I hear about this before?!?! I'm only sorry I didn't buy this sooner and dealt with the problem for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Lle

customer_reviews.title: Miracle file! Be careful, very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This foot file is AMAZING! My fiancée has had thick, calloused heels for years & this file was able to take all of it off! It's like he has brand new feet! Will definitely be buying it again when it's time for a new one!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: A must have tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a large tool & it works so very well. I prefer to use it on dry skin although wet skin is okay too! I have learned to use less pressure as a little scraping goes a long ways. From dry calloused old feet, I now have smoother, softer callous free feet. This tool takes little time to use & has done far better a job then expensive pedicures...easier & quicker to keep up healthy feet & a value saver. This is a great tool to give to friends as gifts as I have never seen this tool in stores on this scale. And yes, this tool is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tempe Mindspring

customer_reviews.title: Grate!!! (pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly skeptical that this thing would be as amazing as all the reviews were saying, but I'm now a believer. Goodbye gross dead skin!!! Just make sure you're not trying to use this when your feet are wet from a shower or even sweaty from a long day, because it won't do its job. It does say that, though, in the pamphlet you get with it. Enjoy the baby smooth heels you're sure to enjoy with this bad boy in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Only buy if you have some serious stuff to scrape off. I'm still healing from one use.
customer_reviews.author: kckevinwhite

customer_reviews.title: Best callus remover ever
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the blades and pumices stones but they still left my heels rough or uneven but this rasp works like a dream. Caution: use a light touch so you don't remove too much at one time. I've used it twice and both times was incredibly easy and productive. I didn't even have to sand them to remove leftover pieces. My heels are pretty pink again.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Wow this works!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazingly cool and gross at the same time! I couldn't believe how much dead skin was on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Turner

customer_reviews.title: Can take it down the bone
customer_reviews.text: This will rock your world once use get the hang of it. I use it around my heels, weavers calluses on my soles and huge pinch callus on my big toe. Yes, I do have to see a podiatrist every 3 months. THis just keeps the feet happy between visits. Oh and IM a diabetic with foot neuropathy
customer_reviews.author: MasterofChaos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing foot file
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally leave many reviews but I must express my love for this foot file. I get bad calluses on my heals, that also have deep cracks in them, and nothing I've used as ever removed all of it until I found this. It only takes a few minutes to have baby soft feet. Be very careful though, you can easily remove more skin than you need to and that will leave you with sore feet.
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: Effective as H*ck
customer_reviews.text: Great file! I get really thick calluses & this takes them all the way down with no trouble. They used to make one with a cover to catch the shavings with a sandpaper type file on the other side to smooth everything out that I really loved too.
customer_reviews.author: S.D. Moose

customer_reviews.title: You'll never need another foot filer again after this one!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never use another brand of foot file again. I have tried countless foot files and they've never worked - until this one! I am thoroughly pleased with this one & it is definitely professional grade. I was hesitant to file my heels dry, just as the packaging suggested - but I did and will never go back to doing it with wet feet again! It's amazing how well this thing works. I literally swiped 3 times back and forth on my heel and everything was removed and restored to "normal" again. It was wonderful!! I will happily recommend this product to anyone looking for a professional grade foot file.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alonzai

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy and Quick - now I have smooth feet again!
customer_reviews.text: Dry skin - dry, dry feet! I've tried lots of different rasps and products to try and get smooth feet and most fall short or take a ton of work. I got this based on the reviews and ten minutes after opening the package I've got the smoothest feet than I've had in years! I like that it works with dry feet as opposed to just soaked feet because it's faster. Whip this out - put my feet over an old newspaper and run it back and forth over the rough areas. Then slather with lotion and put socks on - yeah! Easy Peasy and quick. Just be sure to use a light touch to not over do it.
customer_reviews.author: LKP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my fave beauty tools. I am very conscientious about my feet and get pedicures 12 months per year so I was excited to find this item to help keep my feet in great shape. I use it almost daily in the shower for a minute or so, and it keeps my feet baby soft in between pedicures. I bought my sister one (because she kept trying to steal mine!), and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: C.L. Green

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me (thick dead skin) - not for husband (elderly delicate skin)
customer_reviews.text: If you buy it make sure the feet you intend to use it with are grossly coarse. If it's just a minor hardening issue a lava stone will work nicer, but this baby sure does a job on the nasty stuff. Pros: doesn't need pre-soaking. Use it straight up.
customer_reviews.author: Melian

customer_reviews.title: Not for the feint of heart or foot.
customer_reviews.text: This will really grate the bejeezus out of your feet if you're not careful!. It really gets the job done. Don't go too crazy with it the first time you use it, because you may find that you've removed a lot more skin than you intended. My kitchen grater/zester is made by the same company, if that gives you any hint as to the heavy-duty nature of this tool. Really removes dry dead skin like a champ. I find that my skin is still a little rough after using this and I couple my use of this tool with a pumice stone to get a nice and smooth skin surface.
customer_reviews.author: bheckelTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. The reviews sold me on it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. The reviews sold me on it. I had a few dry/callused spots on my feet that even professional pedicures weren't fixing. Got this and followed the many warnings to go gentle and not to soak the feet first. Didn't take much to make my feet smooth again. I bought one for my sister too.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to go too deep so be very careful
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, but word of warning, it's easy to go too deep so be very careful. I thought I was being careful, and ended up having sore places on my feet afterward.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseK

product_meta.title: Microplane Colossal Pedicure Rasp (Foot File)
product_meta.description: Buy micro plane manicure & pedicure tools - micro plane colossal pedicure rasp brown. Instantly eliminates thick callused skin no need to soak feet prior to use largest file surface light-weight file surface made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Save time with the larger file surface than other Microplane foot files, plus this foot file eliminates the need to use harsh chemicals to remove calluses
Salon-quality pedicure at home! The larger filing surface means faster and better removal of dead skin and calluses.
Lightweight, to make it easier to hold and use! The filing edge is set at a height to scrape off dead skin, and not cut or scrape into the fresh skin causing sore feet.
Eco-Friendly: First, it keeps disposable grits out of landfills and second, waterless pedicures decrease water consumption
Built to last, this product uses stainless steel and sturdy construction, so you can leave it in the shower, or along the tub without worrying about rust.
